text: Kɨ ghua gumazamiziba bar deravɨra men gara fo, me osemegha bar atiatingi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ kɨ dɨkavigha gumazir dapaniba ko, ingangaribar ganamin gumaziba ko, gumazamiziba bar, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia apanibar atiatingan markɨ. Bizir ekiar kam, ia deragh a gɨnɨghnɨgh egh fogh, Ekiam bar gavgafi, ezɨ gumazamiziba bar an atiatingi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia orakigh, ia uan namakaba ko amuiroghboriba ko dɨpeniba bagh deraghvɨra mɨsogh gavgafigh.”
